WorkItem.Description:
When trying to delete a story just published, iget the above and story is not deleted?

Marco
WorkItem.Summary: An unexpected error has occurred while deleting story.

Comments.Message: Could you please identify if you are using Entity Framework or LINQ to SQL?

I guess it is a bug in Entity Framework repositories. You can switch to LINQ to SQL till the bug is fixed in EF implementation. I tested it on EF and I was able to get the error.
In LINQ to SQL it is working fine.
Fixed in changeset 29462 but release isn't updated yet
